<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 93 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 400 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to armor

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>envision</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This ornamental pin, consisting of a single preserved dragon scale from a [chromatic](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=34) or [metallic](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=35) dragon mounted in a setting of precious metal, is typically affixed between the shoulder blades. When you Activate the pin, a pair of draconic wings matching the color of the scale unfurl from your shoulders, granting you a fly Speed of 50 feet for 5 minutes.

**Craft Requirements** Supply one scale from an adult or older [dragon](/Traits.aspx?ID=50).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
